media.caption: Advertisement for the American mystery film The House of the Tolling Bell (1920) with Bruce Gordon, May McAvoy, Edward Elkas, William R. Dunn, and Morgan Thorpe, from the insert after page 18 of the September 18, 1920 Exhibitors Herald.
